about_the_game:
An electrifying adventure with a drill-head hero! Get ready to drill and blast everything in front of you in this challenging game made by fans of classic 90s platformers! Shoot, slide, enter tubes and be launched by cannons, drill everything in your path!




Embark on this unique adventure where your drill head is your greatest weapon!
Take on the role of Drilly, a dedicated robot who finds himself helping the forces against a terrible catastrophe that has occurred on the worker planets of Ciberion. Enter fast tunnels, be launched to various places and pierce everything around you! Jump, dodge and shoot your hand cannon with a variety of unique abilities in this unique and fun platformer.


History:

In the heart of the Cybersphere Ciberion, lives the advanced "Cybernetic Mother", supervisor of all worker planets. In this world inhabited exclusively by friendly dedicated robots, each one plays a specific role, from building structures to collecting valuable resources.

The routine changes drastically when the Cybernetic Mother presents flaws in her algorithms. Planets, once filled with order and efficiency, now face chaos. Other robots start acting strangely, and cities are falling apart! The Cybernetic Mother, once a source of guidance, becomes unstable and needs urgent repairs!

Highlights:

— Explore Amazing Worlds:

Immerse yourself in levels with elaborate designs. Slide, jump and shoot your way through vibrant environments, facing increasingly dangerous challenges!

— Customize Your Hero:

Visit the store and choose from a variety of upgrades. Upgrade your drill head, choose stylish uniforms and strengthen your cannon to overcome any opponent!

— Get Ready for Action:

An immersive experience that combines nostalgia with the excitement of new challenges! Prove yourself worthy of being called a hero!

— Intense Adventure:

Challenge yourself to explore every corner, finding the hidden gears and unlocking new areas and secrets of the Cybersphere!

— Rewarding difficulty:

A challenging game that offers a rewarding experience for players of all skill levels!
